Web developer, Portsmouth UK

Word muncher

October 2019

Word Muncher is a rich text editor made using React, Next.js and Draft.js. The purpose of this project was to create a note app which removes all the unessacary tools you get when using programs such as Google Docs while still maintaining the professional appearance you can achieve with them.

Creative Portsmouth

June 2019 to August 2019

Creative Portsmouth is a geolocation app designed to showcase the creative and cultural organisations around the city of Portsmouth.
